notes: This map illustrates potential satellite-detected damaged structures in Maisi town and the surrounding area in Guantanamo Province, Cuba. The UNITAR-UNOSAT analysis used a Pleiades satellite image, acquired on the 7 October 2016, and identified 417 damaged structures within the map extent; 230 were identified inside the town of Maisi .This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
